module.name: Fax Configuration
module.description: Adds configurations, options and GUI for inbound faxing
module.changelog: *2.10.0.6* re #5906 - workaround for php < 5.2 *2.10.0.5* minor code cleanup *2.10.0.4* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.3* re #5707 - allow posted values to show on page; minor costmetics towards moving to a proper view *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* incorrect path to system conversion script *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.5* #5029 *2.9.0.4* #5000 *2.9.0.3* #4886 additional *2.9.0.2* #4886, #4907 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4562, #4326, #4557, #4632, #4651, #4653
